about.title: About Us
about.text2: We are a flexible, innovative, responsive and entrepreneurial IT company with 10+ years of experience in Germany.
about.text3: In 2022 we have established an entity in Tashkent -Scientech Solution.
about.text4: We structure our businesses around the needs of our customers and provide only those central services which are essential to our growth.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.text1:
The project involved designing a landing page for Uzbek startups. We conducted thorough research, analyzed
            successful landing pages, and developed a wireframe based on our findings. After multiple iterations, we
            created a visually appealing and user-friendly design. The page was optimized for SEO and extensively tested
            for optimal performance. The result is a dynamic and informative landing page that effectively showcases
            Uzbek startups.
portfolio.text3: JK Trockenbau German construction company website
portfolio.text4: We designed a landing page for a German construction company by conducting thorough research, developing a strategic plan, and creating a visually appealing layout with compelling content. The final design is responsive and effectively represents the company to attract potential clients.
portfolio.text5: Digitalization of Wind Energy Systems and Processes
portfolio.text6: We designed a landing page for the digitalization of wind energy systems and processes. Through in-depth research, we developed a visually engaging layout that highlights the benefits of digitalization in improving efficiency and sustainability. The landing page was optimized for seamless performance across devices, effectively conveying the value of digitalization in the wind energy sector.
portfolio.text8: We successfully completed a project to design a website for a company that owns a coworking zone. Through market research and competitor analysis, we developed a visually appealing and user-friendly layout that effectively showcases the coworking spaces and amenities. The website is optimized for responsiveness and offers engaging content to attract potential clients.
portfolio.text9: Development of Digital Maintenance Dashboard for Aircraft Parts
portfolio.text10: We designed a landing page for the digitalization of wind energy systems and processes. Through in-depth research, we developed a visually engaging layout that highlights the benefits of digitalization in improving efficiency and sustainability. The landing page was optimized for seamless performance across devices, effectively conveying the value of digitalization in the wind energy sector.
